summary:
Scan to connect with one of our mobile apps - Connect with your self-custody wallet

 Coinbase Wallet app - Connect with your self-custody wallet

 Coinbase app - Connect with your Coinbase account

 Open Coinbase Wallet app - Tap Scan

 Or try the Coinbase Wallet browser extension - Install

 Connect with dapps with just one click on your desktop browser - Add an additional layer of security by using a supported Ledger hardware wallet
